About.paragraph: The transportation sector is the backbone of modern society, facilitating the movement of people and goods, enabling economic growth, and connecting communities. However, road accidents remain a significant global challenge, causing immense human and financial losses. In 2020, road accidents claimed the lives of 1.35 million people worldwide, with an estimated 50 million people injured. The World Health Organization (WHO) projects that road traffic injuries will become the seventh leading cause of death globally by 2030. The rapid advancements in information technology and the proliferation of internet-connected devices have generated a vast trove of data that can be harnessed to address transportation challenges. This data, ranging from social media posts and news articles to real-time traffic sensor data, holds immense potential for researchers and policymakers to gain insights into road accident patterns, identify contributing factors, and develop targeted interventions. Data mining from internet-based data sources presents a transformative opportunity to enhance road safety and reduce the impact of road accidents. By harnessing the power of data mining techniques, researchers and policymakers can gain unprecedented insights into road accident patterns, identify contributing factors, and develop targeted interventions, paving the way for a safer and more efficient transportation system.

Services.name: Data Mining
Services.text: Data mining is the process of discovering patterns and extracting useful information from large datasets.

Services.name: Web Scraping
Services.text: Web scraping involves extracting data from websites, typically for purposes such as market research or competitive analysis.

Services.name: FastAPI
Services.text: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.

Services.name: Large Language Model (LLM)
Services.text: A Large Language Model (LLM) is a type of artificial intelligence that can generate human-like text based on the input it receives.

Services.name: MySQL
Services.text: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system that is commonly used for web development and online applications.

Services.name: Selenium
Services.text: Selenium is an open-source automation framework for web applications, enabling testers and developers to automate browser interactions and perform functional testing.
